entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 later this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
